title: Anandavalli
sahitya:
Anandavalli kuru mudama viratam Anandavalli


anupallavi

  dIna jana santapatimirAmrta kiraNayita suhase dhrta shukapOta vilAsini jaya paramAnandavalli


caraNam 1    jambhavi mata mukha sEvita pada yugaLE girirAja sutE ghanasAra lasita vidhukhaNDa sadrsha niTilE shambhu vadana sarasIruha madhupE sArasAKSi hrti vihAra divAnisham
    caraNam 2    kEsha pAsha jita sajala jaladanikarE pada pankaja sEvaka khEda jala samAnaika parama caturE nAshitAgha caritE bhuvanatraya nAyikE vitarE mE shubhamanupamam
    caraNam 3    sharadEndu rucimaNjuLatama vadanE muni hrdaya nivAsini cArukuNDala mukulOpama vardanE pArijAta taru pallava caraNE padmanAbha sahajE haram mE shucam
